content.rendered:
Directed by Vishal Pandya

Written by Vishal Pandya. Sameer Arora. Milap Zaveri. Vijei Joshi

Cast Urvashi Rautela (Tasha). Gulshan Grover (Vikram Kurana). Ayvianna Snow (Newsreader). Manoj Anand (Millionaire Hotel Guest). Ihana Dhillon (Reshma). Lee Byford (Police officer). Vivan Bhatena (Aryan). Tia Bajpai (Bhavna Shrivastav). Atul Sharma (Millionaire Hotel Guest). Ty Hurley (Bar Diner). Lee Nicholas Harris (Police officer 401). Daniel Eghan (Rich Hotel Guest). Shubhangi Latkar (Tasha’s Mom). Karan Wahi (Rajveer). Jack Armstrong (UK News Reporter). Shaad Randhawa (Ashwin Chaudhary). Crystal Wingx (Rich Hotel Guest). Max Dowler (Police Sgt 492). Vaunisha Kapoor (Rich Hotel Guest). Rita Di Tuccio (Monica (as Rita Siddiqui)). Komal Chhabria (Mother). Shivraj Walvekar (Police Inspector). Mohammad Salman Khan (Salman). Seema Morar (Rich Hotel Guest). Martin Webbe (Armed Police officer). Nisha George (Rich Hotel Guest). Arun Kapur (Paparazzi / House Party Guest). Mohit Chhabra (Ron). Anna Tilbury (Rich Hotel Guest). Frina Mehta (Rich Hotel Guest). James Heron (Rich Hotel Guest). Joshua Gill (House Party Guest). Tatiana Natalia Carpenter (Rich Hotel Guest (as Tatiana Zarubova)). Ayan ((as Ayan Nayak)). Aliraza Namdar (Mr. Shrivastav). Gareth Bennett-Ryan (UK News Reporter). Annie Hawkins (Elegant Party Guest). Fiona Thompson (Wealthy Hotel Guest (as Fiona)). Shannon Carey (Ball Attendant (credit only)). Theresa Lamb (Rich Hotel Guest). Umair Patel (Musical Artist (archive sound)). Shahan Chaudhry (Rich Hotel Guest). Sanjana G. Sandhu (Rich Hotel Guest). Leyton Benta (Rich Hotel Guest). Hitanshu Arora (Hotel Paparazzi). Nila Blue (Anna (as Nila Patel)). Shaid Parvaz (House Party Guest). Harmeet Sawhney (Vivek). Jane Hamer (Rich Hotel Guest). Aline Costa (Rich Hotel Guest). Mihir Chowdhury (Fighter (credit only)). Zsanett Kiss (Posh Hotel Guest). Kati Mocho (Ball Guest). Aklima Uddin (Rich Hotel Guest). Paul Bates (Rich party guest). Hamid Sahar (Bar Tender). Steven Eljay (English Dignitory (as Mike J Stevenson)). Jatinder Rehal (Party Guest). Komal Padwal (Rich Hotel Guest). Jay Gandhi (Hotel Paparazzi). Saima Patel (Rich Hotel Guest). James Abbey (Police Officer (uncredited)). Alan Andrade (Paramedic (uncredited)). Antonio de Faria (Rich Party Guest (uncredited)). Linda E Greenwood (Party Guest (uncredited)). Swaylee Loughnane (Party Guest (uncredited)). Jeanette Maskell (Hotel Guest at reception (uncredited)). Kevin Matadeen (Terrace Guest (uncredited)). Zivile Matikiene (Rich Hotel Guest (uncredited)). Daniel Maya (Photographer (uncredited)). Matthew Rutherford (Ad Film Client (uncredited)). Andrea Sandell (Journalist (uncredited)). Olga Savic (Posh Party Guest (uncredited)). Natalie Small (Guest (uncredited)). Wei-Chen Sun (Terrace Guest (uncredited)). Donatas Talmontas (VIP Guest (uncredited)). Phil Tillott (Party Guest (uncredited)). David Vickers (Party goer (uncredited)). Lee Westwick (Party Guest (uncredited))

Languages Hindi

Producers Ayan. Vivek Bhatnagar. Sam Bhattacharjee. Ravi Chaturvedi. Hanif Chunawala. Manoj Khatri. Bhushan Kumar. Krishan Kumar. Chitrasen Pawar. Yogiraj Shetty

Production T-Series
